Key Match Events: Glenn Phillips hit a stunning century off 61 balls before falling for 104
Tim Southee and Trent Boult quickly reduced Sri Lanka to 8-4 in the reply
Kumara st Conway b Sodhi 4 (SL 102 all out)
Post-Match Reflections: There’s a lot of cricket left so for us it's about focusing on the next game. As we have seen it doesn’t matter who you play, anyone can beat anyone.
There is a way to chase down big totals and in the first couple of overs we have to give ourselves a chance. We never gone settled, we failed. Wickets fell at regular intervals.
If we can finish with a couple of wins then we have a chance of qualifying so we're looking forward to those games.
